attributes.action: Acknowledge that troubled youth and individuals would benefit from our great armed service, and enstill discipline and a feeling of well being, this applies to all school leavers who don't persue further education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish, as a 19 year old to end the trait of most of my peer group, this arrogance that they can do anything they like and not respect the well established rules in this country, maybe if they experienced first hand what it is to defend your values and how to become a good british citizen and understands good core values, I believe as a good British citizen this could deal with a lot of the problems of a troubled youth.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
